attributes.action: All Government & Local Elections to be decided by Proportional representation.
attributes.additional_details: We have seen so much distrust and division in politics recently showing the frustration of both politicians and public . We need to show a will to allow all sectors of the community to be represented .
attributes.background:
The current electoral systems leave a significant section of the populations views and desires unrepresented in Government & local elections.
It would lead to better represented and balanced debates in parliament and  Town Halls with a greater spread of community viewpoints and representations.
